name: Kyle

projects.title: BestBuy Web Scraper
projects.description: Used Selennium webdriver in Python to develop Discord Bot webscraper that notifies users of price, status and restock of items.

projects.title: Cache

projects.title: Swimming Pool Simulation
projects.description: Coded a GUI for simulating Olympic swim races using functional programming langugae Racket

aboutpara: I am a 2nd year Computer Science currently attending the University of Chicago. I am most familiar with Python and C but I have experience with both backend and frontend langugages such as mySQL, ReactNative, NodeJS etc. I am fascinated by machine learning and artifical intelligence and my non professional interests include swimming, weightlifting, music and food.
